newsitem.title: UK: BOE gives UK money market 170 mln stg late help.
newsitem.headline: BOE gives UK money market 170 mln stg late help.

text.p: The Bank of England said it provided the UK money market with around 170 million stg of unspecified late assistance.
FORECAST SHORTAGE 1.8 BLN 1.8 BLN 1.9 BLN 1.9 BLN
CUMULATIVE SUPPLY 200 MLN# 1.0 BLN! 1.7 BLN 1.87 BLN
# INCLUDES 100 MLN STG BILLS/FRG FOR RESALE SEPT 10/11 AT
! INCLUDES 800 MLN STG BILLS/FRG FOR RESALE SEPT 10/11
* INTEREST RATE - 5-11/16 PCT (INDICATES UNCHANGED BASE RATES)
